mapper.select: select combin.id, combin.qc_id qcId, bom.id bomId, bom.cn_name `name`, bom.bom_no `number`, combin.qty, combin.qualified_qty qualifiedQty, combin.unqualified_qty unqualifiedQty, combin.qty - (combin.unqualified_qty + combin.qualified_qty) pendingQcQty,true idClass from ope_qc_combin_b combin left join ope_production_combin_bom bom on combin.production_combin_bom_id = bom.id and bom.bom_status = 1 and bom.dr = 0 where combin.dr = 0 and combin.qc_id = #{qcId}

select combin.id, combin.qc_id, bom.id bom_id, bom.cn_name, bom.bom_no,combin.qty, combin.qualified_qty, combin.unqualified_qty, serial.id sn_id,serial.serial_num, serial.lot, '奥格工厂' factory_name,bom.cn_name `name`,true id_class from ope_qc_combin_b combin left join ope_production_combin_bom bom on combin.production_combin_bom_id = bom.id and bom.bom_status = 1 and bom.dr = 0 left join ope_qc_order_serial_bind serial on combin.id = serial.order_b_id and serial.dr = 0 where combin.dr = 0 and combin.id = #{id}
